message.entry: "Index" property must be set to an integer value between 1 and the number of data points.
"Value" property must be set to a real scalar value.
Slider data must be a vector of real values.
Slider data must be a vector of monotonically increasing values without duplicate entries.
Slider position must be specified as a four-entry vector.
Slider width and height must be positive values.
"Selection" property must be an integer ranging between 1 and {0,number,integer}.
AccordionData array has inconsistent number of rows
Number of columns in AccordionData ({0,number,integer}) does not match number of headers ({1,number,integer})
